dc_description_s: Scale approximately 1:21,500. Oriented with north toward the left. Appears in: General atlas. London: published under the superintendence of the Society for the Diffusion of Useful Knowledge [by] George Cox, [1853]. Views below map: Writers buildings -- Government house -- Esplanade Row. Includes list of references to public buildings, churches and chapels. 170 24 x 41 cm, on sheet 37 x 43 cm
dc_creator_sm: Society for the Diffusion of Useful Knowledge (Great Britain)
dc_publisher_sm: published under the superintendence of the Society for the Diffusion of Useful Knowledge by George Cox
